The 4 use cases for webhook APIs

Liam Forde

The success of REST APIs

In Postman’s State of the API 2021 report 94% of developers stated they use REST APIs with nearly 50% of developers reporting that they not only used REST APIs but loved them too!

If you’re involved in digital product development or data integration you probably don’t need much convincing of the value and necessity of REST APIs.

The simplicity of HTTP and JSON, powered by the Open API Specification (OAS or Swagger for those that prefer the grassroots name) has given agility and speed in accessing and managing data.

The success of rest APIsBut where do they fit it?Why do you say? Well A few reasons that include:What about backend Integration?Webhook APIs to continuew jorneyInto the sunset
